title: Maruti Suzuki to launch first electric vehicle and promote diverse eco-friendly technologies in FY25
description: Maruti Suzuki revealed intentions to introduce its first electric vehicle this financial year and promote diverse eco-friendly technologies like hybrid, biogas, and CNG to reduce emissions. Chairman R C Bhargava highlighted a diversified strategy to meet national objectives. The company aims to cater to different market segments while continuing to produce affordable small cars.
